### Investigator Notes
- Central lab results received within 48h turnaround

- SAE report filed: subject 07-118, statin subgroup, ALT 4.2x ULN with bilirubin 2.8x ULN

### Notes
- Week 18: Statin subgroup hepatic enzymes 2-3x ULN across sites. SAE reports under review. Non-statin subgroup within range.
